title: @Riot Will Battlecast Skarner recieve unique visual or effect or anything for the new passive?
body: Just wonder since it's a legendary skin and they usually change this sort of thing in some way, so I am wondering as someone who owns the skin if we should expect any changes, or none.

replies.body:
Hiya Kagami! 

He'll have new Crystal Spires!  Guardian of the Sands Skarner will also have Crystal Spires that match his thematic.
Ooo looks neat thanks for the response ^^.

Yes. In fact, they are already on the PBE:
